io.micronaut.data.r2dbc.operations

Interface BlockingReactorRepositoryOperations

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.ApplicationContextProvider, BlockingReactorRepositoryOperations, HintsCapableRepository, ReactiveCapableRepository, ReactorReactiveCapableRepository, RepositoryOperations

    public interface BlockingReactorRepositoryOperations
extends BlockingReactorRepositoryOperations
    Implementation of RepositoryOperations that blocks every call from ReactorReactiveRepositoryOperations.

    2.4.0
    Author:
